task.title: Adding Your name and contact information
task.shortdesc: It might seem obvious, but job seekers sometimes forget a key piece of contact information in this section. Double check and make it as easy as possible for recruiters to contact you for a job interview.

context.p:
The top of your resume should include:
Name
Phone number
Location
Email Address
LinkedIn profile URL

step.cmd: Include a personal phone number, never a work number.
You donâ€™t need to include your full address but do add your city, state, and zip code. Recruiters often search for local candidates first.
Use a professional sounding email address. Consider creating a free Gmail account for your job search if you currently use a more outdated email service.
Create a strong LinkedIn profile and be sure to include the URL on your resume.
